channel.title: My run server makes my internet not work
channel.description:
i turn server its fine, then this program keeps attacking it, doesnt cause lag or anything, but after like 15 mins i loost internet, on all computers in my house.... i was wondering if i could block the ip not just from the server but from like my modem or soemthing.. or if theres anything i can do server wise. [code] -zumaScape- Server Online Connection accepted from localhost: 1662. Client type: high memory version UserId: 52377318 spec n whip is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-spec n whip]: Loading finished. [client-1-spec n whip]: Case 185: Action Button: 3144 [client-1-spec n whip]: Case 185: Action Button: 3144 Connection accepted from ip68-102-39-36.ks.ok.cox.net: 2277. Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. Connection accepted from c-76-24-74-47.hsd1.ma.comcast.net: 57646. Client type: high memory version UserId: 41040288 jesus christ is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-3-jesus christ]: Loading finished. [/code]
this is what makes it crash eventualy [code] Connection accepted from ip68-102-39-36.ks.ok.cox.net: 2277. Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. [/code]
plz help
~red_rooster

item.title: My run server makes my internet not work
item.dc:creator: @Skiddle Skiddle
item.description:
@Skiddle wrote:

Off topic: vengeance, you ever get that lil program working you were working on like a couple months back.

On topic: go to tutorial section and look for a tut stopping syi, or making one connection per ip.

Read full topic
item.source: My run server makes my internet not work

item.title: My run server makes my internet not work
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

Probably cos your server spams 99999999999 things to each player every 500ms/packet update that need not be sent.

Read full topic
